no_yarns: No yarns added for this fabric yet!
switch_off_message: Do you want to Switch Off?
cut_roll_message: Are you sure you want to cut the roll?
no_fabrics: You haven't created any fabric yet!
false_defects: Defects are visible on fabric but no occurrences were detected.
continues_with_defect: Ocurrences are detected but machine didn't stop.
camera_broken: One or more camera is not working properly
new_defects: The new type of defects is produced.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try again later!
internet_error: Please check your connection and try again!
authentication_failed: Authentication failed, please try to login manually.
user_inactive: This smartex.ai device is not yet activated
yarns_error: You need to add atleast one yarn to create fabric
name: Name:
select_issue_message: Please select an issue from the dropdown
issue_report_failure: Failed to report issue, please try again
defect_stop_message: Please verify and solve the '${defect}' Occurrence and then press Unlock Machine below to resume production.
live_camera_feed: Live camera feed will appear here in a moment
get_state_error: Unable to get state, Please check the connection and try again
enable_machine_error: Unable to start system, Please check the connection and try again
disable_machine_error: Unable to stop system, Please check the connection and try again
update_po_error: Unable to update production number, please check your connection and try again
cut_roll_error: Unable to cut the roll, please check your connection and try again
unlock_machine_error: Unable to unlock machine, please check your connection and try again
service_ping_fail_message: Connection to Smartex services lost, reconnecting…
send_settings_error: Unable to update settings, please check your connection and try again
camera_permission_denied: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes.
broker_not_found: Couldn't find broker, please try again
rmq_not_connected: Couldn't connect to RabbitMQService, please try again
step_smartex_logo: This logo is used to navigate to the main screen.
step_available: This shows the availabilty of the machine functionalities.
step_signal: This icon depicts the current network signal strength.
step_rpm: This number represents the current RPM of the machine.
step_settings: This button navigates to settings where we can change language and other system parameters.
step_help: This button navigates to help screen where we can report problem with the system.
step_switch_off: This button switches operating mode to "DETECTION MODE". Press it again to return to "STOPPAGE MODE".
step_live_feed: The live feed of images received from machine are shown here.
step_selected_fabric: The details of current selected fabric is shown in this section.
step_start_roll: This button is used to mark the beginning of a new roll.
step_shifts: This graph shows statistics of current shift and previous 2 shifts.
step_last_defective: This section shows the most recent occurrences detected by the Smartex system.
step_producing_number: This field can be used to enter the Production Order number.
step_add_fabric: This button can be used to create new fabric
step_select_fabric: You can select an already created fabric from this list
step_continue: This button confirms the roll cut and starts new roll.
step_fabric_structure: Search for fabric structure in this list. If fabric doesn't exist you get the option to create a new structure as well.
step_add_new_yarn: This button is used to create new yarns for this fabric
step_yarn_list: The yarns are shown here after being created. You can then edit, reorder or delete them.
step_create: This button is used to create a new fabric that will then be shown on the previous screen.
step_description: Add a relevant description for the issue
step_submit: Press this button to submit issue.
step_language: You can change the language of the app.
step_machine_settings: Machine settings can be tweaked from here.
step_save: Touch this button to save settings.
reset_message: Are you sure you want to reset all values?
waiting_for_reconnection: Waiting for all subsystems to connect again...
threshold_message: Threshold values should lie between 0 to 1
enter_cmRotation_value: Please enter cm per rotation value
enter_rotation_after_stop_value: Please enter rotation after stoppage value
session_expired_desciption: Your login session has expired, You need to login again to continue
stop_if_validation: Fabric length with occurrences(occurrence * 20) should be less than the total length value.
ask_for_updates: A new version is available. Do you want to update now?
no_new_version_available_to_download: You are on the latest version
restart_application: Please restart the tablet if it is not able to connect and the machine is running.
